title: Gather Requirements for BiorhythmOptimizer System
description:
Conduct extensive research and gather comprehensive requirements for the BiorhythmOptimizer system. This includes understanding user needs, identifying suitable biorhythm data sources, investigating scheduling algorithms, defining performance/wellbeing metrics, addressing data privacy and security concerns, exploring potential integration with existing systems or APIs, and researching third-party services or libraries to leverage for optimal functionality. Additionally, consider the following specific areas: 
1. Data Collection and Analysis: Determine the most effective methods for collecting and analyzing biorhythm data.
2. Personalization: Identify how the system can be tailored to individual users' needs and preferences.
3. Real-time Adaptability: Investigate how the system can adapt in real-time based on changing biorhythms or user activities.
4. User Interface Design: Provide suggestions for a user-friendly interface that effectively communicates scheduling recommendations.

title: Design System Architecture for BiorhythmOptimizer
description: Design the overall system architecture for the BiorhythmOptimizer project. This includes components for data ingestion, biorhythm analysis, scheduling optimization, user interfaces, and data storage. Consider scalability, performance, security, maintainability, fault tolerance, and edge cases (e.g., handling missing or inconsistent data). Define the interactions between components, data flow, and communication protocols. Identify potential third-party services or libraries to be integrated, with a focus on compatibility, licensing, and reliability. Provide detailed documentation for each component, including expected behavior. Once design is complete, conduct code reviews of related designs and ensure adherence to project standards. Upon completion, update the RFC with these details, ensuring clarity and simplicity in presentation.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment, including version control, continuous integration/deployment pipelines, and development tools.

title: Implement Data Ingestion
description: Implement the data ingestion component to collect and process biorhythm data from various sources.

title: Develop Biorhythm Analysis
description: Develop the biorhythm analysis component to process and analyze biorhythm data using AI/ML techniques.

title: Implement Scheduling Optimization
description: Implement the scheduling optimization component to generate optimized daily schedules based on biorhythm analysis and user preferences.

title: Design User Interfaces - RFC
description: Design intuitive and user-friendly interfaces for inputting biorhythm data, viewing analysis results, and managing optimized schedules. The interfaces should be responsive, accessible, and follow best practices for user experience (UX) design. Additionally, consider the integration with existing design system architecture and cater to defined user personas and use cases.
dependencies: Define User Personas and Use Cases

title: Implement User Interfaces
description: Implement the user interfaces based on the approved designs, ensuring responsiveness and accessibility.

title: Set up Testing Framework
description: Set up a comprehensive testing framework, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Conduct Security Audits
description: Perform security audits to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities in the system.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including user guides, developer guides, and system architecture documentation.

title: Deploy and Monitor
description: Deploy the BiorhythmOptimizer system to production environments, and set up monitoring and logging systems.
